spell_tooltip.description:
Rake the target for 56,176 Bleed damage and an additional 366,964 Bleed damage over 11.3 sec. 

While stealthed, Rake will also stun the target for 4 sec and deal 60% increased damage.

Awards 1 combo point.
Heals you for 20% health over 5 sec, and increases healing received by 20%.
Rake, Rip, and Thrash damage increased by 10%.
Thrash all nearby enemies, dealing immediate physical damage and periodic bleed damage. Damage varies by shapeshift form.

Stamina increased by 4%.

Stamina in Bear Form is increased by an additional 5%.
Frenzied Regeneration and Barkskin increase all healing received by 20%.
Nullifies corrupting effects on the friendly target, removing all Curse and Poison effects.
Physical damage and Armor increased by 6%.
Increases armor by 90,943 for 9 sec.
Barkskin's duration is increased by 4 sec.
Magical damage and healing increased by 6%.
Reduces all damage taken by 4%.
You charge and bash the target's skull, interrupting spellcasting and preventing any spell in that school from being cast for 3 sec.
Healing you receive is increased by 4%.
Fly to a nearby ally's position.
Soothes the target, dispelling all enrage effects.

When a hit deals more than 12% of your maximum health, instantly heal for 10% of your health.

This effect cannot occur more than once every 30 seconds.
Increases your movement speed by 15%.
When you fall below 40% health, you cast Frenzied Regeneration, up to once every 90 sec.
Shift into Bear Form and let loose a wild roar, increasing the movement speed of all friendly players within 15 yards by 60% for 8 sec.
Blasts targets within 15 yards in front of you with a violent Typhoon, knocking them back and reducing their movement speed by 50% for 6 sec. Usable in all shapeshift forms.

Conjures a vortex of wind for 10 sec at the destination, reducing the movement speed of all enemies within 8 yards by 50%. The first time an enemy attempts to leave the vortex, winds will pull that enemy back to its center. Usable in all shapeshift forms.
Survival Instincts and Barkskin reduce damage taken by an additional 10%.
Well-Honed Instincts can trigger up to once every 90 sec.

You gain 12% of a stat while in each form:

No Form: Haste
Cat Form: Critical Strike
Bear Form: Versatility
Moonkin Form: Mastery
Moonfire and Sunfire damage increased by 10%.
Infuse a friendly healer with energy, allowing them to cast spells without spending mana for 8 sec.
Shift into Bear Form and invoke the spirit of Ursol to let loose a deafening roar, incapacitating all enemies within 10 yards for 3 sec. Damage may cancel the effect.
Physical damage dealt by your abilities increased by 5%.
Form a bond with an ally. Your self-healing also heals your bonded ally for 10% of the amount healed. Your healing to your bonded ally also heals you for 8% of the amount healed.

Abilities not associated with your specialization are substantially empowered for 45 sec.

Balance: Cast time of Balance spells reduced by 30% and damage increased by 20%.

Feral: Gain 1 Combo Point every 2 sec while in Cat Form and Physical damage increased by 20%.

Restoration: Healing increased by 30%, and mana costs reduced by 50%.
Maul the target for 435,163 Physical damage.
Thrash, Swipe, Moonfire, and Maul have a 15% chance to reset the cooldown on Mangle, and to cause it to generate an additional 4 Rage.
Reduces all damage you take by 60% for 6 sec.

Sharp brambles protect you, absorbing and reflecting up to 8,498 damage from each attack.

While Barkskin is active, the brambles also deal 10,235 Nature damage to all nearby enemies every 1 sec.
Mangle deals 20% additional damage against bleeding targets.

Frenzied Regeneration's healing is increased by up to 120% based on your missing health.

Frenzied Regeneration has 1 additional charge.

Go berserk for 15 sec, reducing the cooldowns of Mangle, Thrash, and Growl by 50%.

Combines with other Berserk abilities.
Increases the duration of Barkskin and Ironfur by 2.0 sec.
Frenzied Regeneration heals over 2.0 additional sec and casts Rejuvenation and Regrowth on you at 200% effectiveness.
Gain magical damage reduction equal to 10% of your damage reduction from armor.
When you deal direct damage with Thrash, you gain a charge of Earthwarden, reducing the damage of the next auto attack you take by 25%. Earthwarden may have up to 3 charges.
Mangle generates 5 more Rage and deals 25% more damage.
Ironfur increases armor by an additional 15% and Barkskin reduces damage taken by an additional 10%.
When you cast Ironfur, also deal Physical damage equal to 20% of your armor, split among enemies within 12 yards. Damage reduced above 4 applications.

Go berserk for 15 sec, increasing haste by 15%, and reducing the rage cost of Maul by 50%.

Combines with other Berserk abilities.
While in Bear Form, you deal 20% increased Arcane damage.

Go berserk for 15 sec, reducing the cooldown of Frenzied Regeneration by 100% and cost of Ironfur by 50%.

Combines with other Berserk abilities.
Each stack of Thrash reduces the target's damage to you by 2% and increases your damage to them by 2%.
Your damage over time effects deal their damage in 25% less time, and your healing over time effects in 15% less time.
While in Bear Form, you deal 10% increased Arcane damage, and are healed for 25% of all Arcane damage done.

Your damage has a 5% chance to trigger a free automatic Moonfire on that target. 

When this occurs, the next Moonfire you cast generates 8 Rage, and deals 300% increased direct damage.
Thrash also generates 3 Rage each time it deals damage, on up to 5 targets.

An improved Bear Form that grants the benefits of Berserk, causes Mangle to hit up to 3 targets, and increases maximum health by 30%.

Lasts 30 sec. You may freely shapeshift in and out of this improved Bear Form for its duration.
Moonfire deals 8% increased damage and also hits another nearby enemy within 15 yds of the target.

Incarnation: Guardian of Ursoc: 
Every 25 Rage you spend reduces the cooldown of Incarnation: Guardian of Ursoc by 1 sec.

 Convoke the Spirits: 
Convoke the Spirits' cooldown is reduced by 50% and its duration and number of spells cast is reduced by 25%. Convoke the Spirits has an increased chance to use an exceptional spell or ability.
Unleashes the rage of Ursoc for 8 sec, preventing 20% of all damage you take, increasing your damage done by 15%, granting you 20% leech, and reflecting 66,315 Nature damage back at your attackers.
Summons a beam of lunar light at your location, increasing your mastery by 30%, dealing 588,131 Arcane damage, and healing you for 4.3 million over 11 sec.

Lunar Beam
Lunar Beam now causes you to leech life equal to 10% of all damage dealt to enemies within the beam.

 Fury of Elune
Fury of Elune now ends with a flash of energy, blasting nearby enemies for 292,682 Astral damage.
Free automatic Moonfires from Galactic Guardian generate 5 Rage.
Moonfire deals 8% additional damage.
Bear Form and Moonkin Form reduce Arcane damage taken by 6% and all other magic damage taken by 3%.
Each non-Arcane damaging ability you use increases the damage of your next Arcane damaging ability by 3%, stacking up to 3 times.
Enemies damaged by Lunar Beam or Fury of Elune take 6% increased damage from you for 6 sec.
Using Wild Charge while in Bear Form or Moonkin Form incurs a 3 sec shorter cooldown.
Thrash now deals Arcane damage and its damage is increased by 12%.

Moonfire damage has a chance to call down a Fury of Elune to follow your target for 3 sec.

 Fury of Elune
Calls down a beam of pure celestial energy, dealing 293,988 Astral damage over 3 sec within its area.

Generates 18 Rage over its duration.
Your Arcane abilities reduce the cooldown of Lunar Beam by 3.0 sec.

Further increases the power of Boundless Moonlight.

 Lunar Beam
Lunar Beam increases Mastery by an additional 11%, deals 30% increased damage, and lasts 3 sec longer.

 Fury of Elune
The flash of energy now generates  6 Rage and its damage is increased by 50%.

Rake the target for 55,388 Bleed damage and an additional 366,964 Bleed damage over 11.3 sec. 

While stealthed, Rake will also stun the target for 4 sec and deal 60% increased damage.

Awards 1 combo point.

While stealthed, Rake will also stun the target for 4 sec and deal 60% increased damage.

Heals you for 20% health over 5 sec, and increases healing received by 20%.
Rake, Rip, and Thrash damage increased by 10%.
Thrash all nearby enemies, dealing immediate physical damage and periodic bleed damage. Damage varies by shapeshift form.

Stamina increased by 4%.

Stamina in Bear Form is increased by an additional 5%.

Finishing move that causes Bleed damage over time. Lasts longer per combo point.

   1 point  : 289,359 over 6 sec
   2 points: 434,039 over 9 sec
   3 points: 578,718 over 12 sec
   4 points: 723,398 over 15 sec
   5 points: 868,078 over 18 sec
Frenzied Regeneration and Barkskin increase all healing received by 20%.
Nullifies corrupting effects on the friendly target, removing all Curse and Poison effects.
Physical damage and Armor increased by 6%.
Increases armor by 90,943 for 9 sec.
Barkskin's duration is increased by 4 sec.
Magical damage and healing increased by 6%.

While in Cat Form, when you critically strike with an attack that generates a combo point, you gain an additional combo point. Damage over time cannot trigger this effect.

Mangle critical strike damage increased by 20%.
Reduces all damage taken by 4%.
You charge and bash the target's skull, interrupting spellcasting and preventing any spell in that school from being cast for 3 sec.
Fly to a nearby ally's position.
Soothes the target, dispelling all enrage effects.

When a hit deals more than 12% of your maximum health, instantly heal for 10% of your health.

This effect cannot occur more than once every 30 seconds.
Increases your movement speed by 15%.
When you fall below 40% health, you cast Frenzied Regeneration, up to once every 90 sec.
Shift into Bear Form and let loose a wild roar, increasing the movement speed of all friendly players within 15 yards by 60% for 8 sec.
Blasts targets within 15 yards in front of you with a violent Typhoon, knocking them back and reducing their movement speed by 50% for 6 sec. Usable in all shapeshift forms.
Survival Instincts and Barkskin reduce damage taken by an additional 10%.
Ferocious Bite and Maul damage increased by 8%.

You gain 12% of a stat while in each form:

No Form: Haste
Cat Form: Critical Strike
Bear Form: Versatility
Moonkin Form: Mastery
Moonfire and Sunfire damage increased by 10%.
Infuse a friendly healer with energy, allowing them to cast spells without spending mana for 8 sec.
Physical damage dealt by your abilities increased by 5%.
You retain Lycara's Teachings' bonus from your most recent shapeshift form for 5 sec after shifting out of it, provided you remained in that form for 2.9 sec, reduced by Haste.

Shred, Rake, and Skull Bash can be used in any form and shift you into Cat Form, if necessary. 

Mangle can be used in any form and shifts you into Bear Form. 

Wrath and Starfire shift you into Moonkin Form, if known.

Abilities not associated with your specialization are substantially empowered for 45 sec.

Balance: Cast time of Balance spells reduced by 30% and damage increased by 20%.

Feral: Gain 1 Combo Point every 2 sec while in Cat Form and Physical damage increased by 20%.

Restoration: Healing increased by 30%, and mana costs reduced by 50%.
Maul the target for 437,591 Physical damage.
Thrash, Swipe, Moonfire, and Maul have a 15% chance to reset the cooldown on Mangle, and to cause it to generate an additional 4 Rage.
Reduces all damage you take by 60% for 6 sec.

Sharp brambles protect you, absorbing and reflecting up to 8,498 damage from each attack.

While Barkskin is active, the brambles also deal 10,200 Nature damage to all nearby enemies every 1 sec.
Mangle deals 20% additional damage against bleeding targets.

Frenzied Regeneration's healing is increased by up to 120% based on your missing health.

Frenzied Regeneration has 1 additional charge.

Go berserk for 15 sec, reducing the cooldowns of Mangle, Thrash, and Growl by 50%.

Combines with other Berserk abilities.
Mangle has a 15% chance to reduce the Rage cost of your next Ironfur by 25%.
Maul and Raze have an additional 30% chance to critically strike.
Reduces the cooldowns of Barkskin and Survival Instincts by 24%.
Mangle increases the damage of your next cast of Maul or Raze, and casting Maul or Raze increases the damage of your next Mangle by 15%. Stacks up to 3.

Autoattacks have a 20% chance to empower your next cast of Maul or Raze, stacking up to 2 times.

An empowered cast of Maul or Raze deals 40% increased damage, costs 100% less rage, and reduces the target's damage to you by 12% for 6 sec.
Mangle generates 5 more Rage and deals 25% more damage.
When you cast Ironfur, also deal Physical damage equal to 20% of your armor, split among enemies within 12 yards. Damage reduced above 4 applications.

Go berserk for 15 sec, increasing haste by 15%, and reducing the rage cost of Maul by 50%.

Combines with other Berserk abilities.
While in Bear Form, you deal 20% increased Arcane damage.

Go berserk for 15 sec, reducing the cooldown of Frenzied Regeneration by 100% and cost of Ironfur by 50%.

Combines with other Berserk abilities.
Each stack of Thrash reduces the target's damage to you by 2% and increases your damage to them by 2%.
Your damage over time effects deal their damage in 25% less time, and your healing over time effects in 15% less time.
While in Bear Form, you deal 10% increased Arcane damage, and are healed for 25% of all Arcane damage done.

Your damage has a 5% chance to trigger a free automatic Moonfire on that target. 

When this occurs, the next Moonfire you cast generates 8 Rage, and deals 300% increased direct damage.

Thrash has a 10% chance to trigger an additional Thrash.

Thrash stacks 1 additional time.
Thrash also generates 3 Rage each time it deals damage, on up to 5 targets.

An improved Bear Form that grants the benefits of Berserk, causes Mangle to hit up to 3 targets, and increases maximum health by 30%.

Lasts 30 sec. You may freely shapeshift in and out of this improved Bear Form for its duration.
Your direct damage melee abilities against enemies afflicted by Moonfire cause them to burn for an additional 20% Arcane damage.

Incarnation: Guardian of Ursoc: 
Every 25 Rage you spend reduces the cooldown of Incarnation: Guardian of Ursoc by 1 sec.

 Convoke the Spirits: 
Convoke the Spirits' cooldown is reduced by 50% and its duration and number of spells cast is reduced by 25%. Convoke the Spirits has an increased chance to use an exceptional spell or ability.
Unleashes the rage of Ursoc for 8 sec, preventing 20% of all damage you take, increasing your damage done by 15%, granting you 20% leech, and reflecting 66,315 Nature damage back at your attackers.

Your maximum Energy and Rage are increased by 20.

Frenzied Regeneration also increases your maximum health by 10%.

Ravage also inflicts a Bleed that causes 178,792 damage over 6.0 sec and saps its victims' strength, reducing damage they deal to you by 10%.

Dreadful Wound is not affected by Circle of Life and Death.
Maul and Raze damage increased by 20%.

Ironfur and Frenzied Regeneration persist in Cat Form.

When transforming from Bear to Cat Form, you retain 80% of your Bear Form armor and health for 6 sec.

For 6 sec after entering Bear Form, you heal for 10% of damage taken over 8 sec.
Ravage increases your auto-attack speed by 35% for 6 sec.
Stampeding Roar's duration is increased by 25%.

Mangle grants Feline Potential. When you have 6 stacks, the next time you transform into Cat Form, gain 5 combo points and your next Ferocious Bite or Rip deals 200% increased damage for its full duration.
Every Maul, Raze, Mangle,  Thrash, or Swipe you cast extends the duration of your Dreadful Wounds by 0.6 sec, up to 8 additional sec.

Shred, Swipe, and Mangle's critical strike chance and critical strike damage are increased by 15%.

Mangle heals you for 1% of maximum health.
During Berserk, Mangle, Swipe, and Thrash have a 25% chance to make your next Maul become Ravage.

Rake the target for 55,226 Bleed damage and an additional 366,964 Bleed damage over 11.3 sec. 

While stealthed, Rake will also stun the target for 4 sec and deal 60% increased damage.
